sentences.en: Both teams will be using mathematical modelling techniques to optimise and test their designs.
sentences.cn: 两支科研团队都将采用先进的数学建模技术,用以优化和测试其设计程序.

sentences.en: Check and optimise parameters of environmental impact regularly.
sentences.cn: 有规律性地检查和优化关于环境影响的参数.

sentences.en: Even the positioning of a window to optimise daylight can help save energy.
sentences.cn: 连充分利用日光的窗户都是节能的。

sentences.en: Markowitz formalised these ideas and drew up the mathematical formulae to optimise diversification.
sentences.cn: 马柯维茨整理了这些观点,推导出数学公式,使多样化达到最优.

sentences.en: These engines use hydraulics and electronics to optimise valve settings.
sentences.cn: 这些引擎采用液压和电子技术来优化阀门设置.

sentences.en: Work within multifunctional groups and provide commercial direction to resolve problems and optimise performance.
sentences.cn: 在多功能组内工作,提供商务指导,解决问题和优化性能.

trans.tran_cn: 使最优化，使尽可能有效
